Boxes.Alerts.Form.Persistence.Descriptio: Should the Alert remain open until the user dismisses or clicks the notification?
Boxes.Alerts.Form.Tag.Description: Tags can be used to group Alerts (a new notification with a given tag will replace an older notification with the same tag).
Boxes.Alerts.Form.Title: Title
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Auction.Info: Automatically create a new Alert when I make a bid in the Antiques Dealer.
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Auction.Title: Antiques Dealer Auction
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Battlegrounds.I: Send an instant Alert when there is a high activity in GBG (for example, 10 fights in a single sector within 5 seconds). Please note that this function works only when the GBG in-game window is opened!
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Early.Info: Automatically generated Alert times (Antiques Dealer, GBG etc) will use this offset to send notification before the event actually happens. For example, setting this value to 30 (seconds), Auction Alerts will be displayed 30s before the auction actually ends!
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Early.Title: Notify Early Offset
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.InGame.Info: Show in-game notification instead of the native Desktop notification when the game window is focused.
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.InGame.Title: In-game Notifications
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.MenuIcon.Info: Show the next Alert countdown as an overlay of the Main Menu icon
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.MenuIcon.Title: Main Menu Countdown
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Start.Info: Display a list of Alerts which expired while offline (since the game window was closed)
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Start.Title: Expired Alert Summary at Start
Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Suggestions.Inf: Display Alert suggestions (for example, when clicking on a GBG sector, or collecting a building production)
Boxes.AuctionSettings.Help1: This module will automatically generate an auction bid value based on your settings and the current auction bid and copy it to the clipboard.
Boxes.AuctionSettings.Help2: You have to insert it into the bidding field and hit enter.
Boxes.AuctionSettings.Help3: When starting fresh, the module will start in row 1 of the settings and with each consecutive bid, the module will use the next line.
Boxes.AuctionSettings.Help4: When no bid was placed for a minute, the module starts again from the first row.
Boxes.AuctionSettings.Help5: The module will calculate an addition value according to the first column and a multiplication value according to the second column and take the bigger value of the two
Boxes.AuctionSettings.Title: Auction Settings
Boxes.AztecMiniGame.Description: the greener, the higher the chance for a hit:
Boxes.AztecMiniGame.Title: Aztec Helper
Boxes.BattleAssist.Text.NextEra: You have lost a higher era unit (above your current era). However you still have the chance to heal them with diamonds!
Boxes.BattleAssist.Text.Rogue: Your army has only Rogues remining. Either heal units using diamonds or retreat!
Boxes.BattleAssist.Title: Warning!
Boxes.BattleAssistAAConfig.Explanation:
1) When an opposing army has a bonus above the given threshold, the advice will be displayed.
2) To edit thresholds and advices, click into the table - confirm changes with Enter.
3) To remove an advice, save with an empty advice.

Boxes.Calculator.TTForderFPStockLow:
ATTENTION: Not enough FP Packs in stock!
You only have __fpstock__ of __costs__FP
That is __tooless__FPs too few
Boxes.Calculator.TTForderNegativeProfit:
Spot is not safe. __fpcount__ additional FPs must be added.
Total to make spot safe: __totalfp__ FPs
Boxes.Calculator.TTLevelWarning:
Adding __fpcount__ FPs too many!
Maximum investment: __totalfp__ FPs
Boxes.Calculator.TTLoss:
Reward = __nettoreward__ (Net Reward) X __arcfactor__% (Arc Bonus) = __bruttoreward__
Cost: __costs__ - Place locked at: __safe__
Loss = __costs__ (Cost) - __bruttoreward__ (Reward) = __loss__
Boxes.Calculator.TTPaidTooLess: You paid __paid__ FPs instead of __topay__ FPs. That is __tooless__FPs too few.
Boxes.Calculator.TTPaidTooMuch: You paid __paid__ FPs instead of __topay__ FPs. That is __toomuch__FP too many.
Boxes.Calculator.TTProfit:
Reward = __nettoreward__ (Net Reward) X __arcfactor__% (Arc Bonus) = __bruttoreward__
Cost: __costs__ - Place locked at: __safe__
Profit = __bruttoreward__ (Reward) - __costs__ (Cost) = __profit__

Boxes.CityMap.Desc1:
To plan your city on foe-helper.com, we need to send your data to the website.
If you don't have an account there yet, your basic data will be sent along with this transmission. You can then register your account on the website.
Boxes.CityMap.QIHint: All displayed values assume your buildings have finished construction.
Boxes.CityMap.ShowNoStreetBuildings: Highlight buildings that do not need streets
Boxes.CityMap.MissingApiKeySubmitError:
Without an API token for this world, which you can obtain free of charge from the website, you cannot transfer cities or notes.
Click here for instructions:

Boxes.GreatBuildings.AttackPerFP: 1 FP equals __percent__% bonus for attacking army
Boxes.GreatBuildings.AttackValue: Rating value of 1% bonus for attacking army (in FP)
Boxes.GreatBuildings.BreakEvenTT: It will take __days__ days until the investment of __costs__ FP has been returned with a daily production of __fpproduction__ FP/day
Boxes.GreatBuildings.BreakEvenTTAttack: It will take __days__ days until the investment of __costs__ FP has been returned with a daily production of __fpproduction__ FP/day and __attackproduction__ % attack bonus (equals __attackproduction__ * __attackvalue__ = __attackproductionvalue__ FP/day)
Boxes.GreatBuildings.BreakEvenTTGoods: It will take __days__ days until the investment of __costs__ FP has been returned with a daily production of __fpproduction__ FP/day and __goodsproduction__ goods/day (equals __goodsproduction__ * __goodsvalue__ = __goodsproductionvalue__ FP/day)
Boxes.GreatBuildings.BreakEvenTTGoodsAtt: It will take __days__ days until the investment of __costs__ FP has been returned with a daily production of __fpproduction__ FP/day, __goodsproduction__ goods/day (equals __goodsproduction__ * __goodsvalue__ = __goodsproductionvalue__ FP/day) and __attackproduction__ % attack bonus (equals __attackproduction__ * __attackvalue__ = __attackproductionvalue__ FP/day)
Boxes.GreatBuildings.FPPerTile: New buildings: Daily FP/tile of replaced buildings
Boxes.GreatBuildings.NewGBCostsTT: Includes good costs to build the GB valued at __goodcosts__ FPs
Boxes.GreatBuildings.NewGBFPProductionTT: __tiles__ * __fppertile__ = __opcost__ FPs have been subtracted. This is lost by removing other FP producing buildings to make space for __tiles__ tiles to build the GB.
Boxes.GreatBuildings.RewardPerDay: Arc: FP Rewards/day from other players
Boxes.GreatBuildings.SuggestionDescripti: GBs at the top of the list are best value
Boxes.GreatBuildings.TTAttackValue: This value is used for ranking buildings providing attack or defense bonus for the attacking army. How many FP is 1% of either attack or defense boost worth to you?
Boxes.GreatBuildings.TTFPPerTile: How many daily FPs per tile are lost for making space for new GBs? Example: You are removing some Shrines of Knowledge to build a GB => 1FP/5 tiles = 0.2FP/tile
Boxes.GreatBuildings.TTGoodCosts: GB not yet built. This is the FP costs for buying the required goods
Boxes.GreatBuildings.TTGoodCostsColumn: Lists the FP costs for buying the required goods (applies only to GBs you have not yet built)
Boxes.GreatBuildings.TTGoodsValue: This value is used for ranking goods producing buildings. How many FP is one good worth to you?
Boxes.GreatBuildings.TTRewardPerDay: Optional: How many FP rewards do you get per day? This information is used to calculate profitability for further Arc levels. To get a suggestion go to: Town Hall > News > Event History and scroll through all pages
Boxes.GreatBuildings.Title: GB Investment Overview

Boxes.ProductionsRating.Explainer: How does this work? Select how much each of your buildings should ideally produce per tile. The balance between all selected values is important for the final rating. If you have more than one building of the same type, only the building with the highest era will be evaluated.

Settings.About.Desc: The FoE Helper is a free browser extension for Forge of Empires developed for players by players. The tool is not affiliated with InnoGames.

If you want to use the notes or the city planner, activate this item.
For a stand-alone extension, simply deactivate it.
Settings.GlobalSend.Title: Upload/Send data to foe-helper.com
Settings.Help.Desc: There are several ways to get support:
Settings.Help.Discord: Discord: join our server for general discussions about the extension, chats and support.
Settings.Help.Forums: Forums: go here for support and submitting ideas, as well as bug reports.
Settings.Help.Github: GitHub: for more technical bug reports, concrete ideas and helping with development.
Settings.Help.Title: Help and Community
Settings.Help.Website: Website: information and documentation on the extension and it's features.
Settings.HideHelperDuringBattle.Desc: During manual battle if the HelperBox gets in the way, this option temporarily hides the box until the battle is over. This only works with Helper 'As Box'
Settings.HideHelperDuringBattle.Title: Hide helper during battle
Settings.InfoboxEntryCount.Desc:
How many elements should the Infobox display and save?
Empty or "0" means infinite.
Settings.InfoboxEntryCount.Title: Infobox Entry Count
Settings.LoadBeta.Desc:
Only available in the separate extension!!!
It has to be downloaded and added manually to the extensions.
It may not be used in conjunction with the regular Helper extension!

In the beta-version, errors are more likely to occur than on the released version! Please let us know about any found bug on Discord or Github!
Loading times for the extension may be higher than usual!
The game has to be reloaded in order to switch modes!
Settings.LoadBeta.Title: Load current Beta
Settings.MenuContent.Desc:
Which buttons do you want in the menu?
Green: show button. Red: don't show button.
Settings.MenuContent.Title: Menu Content
Settings.MenuLength.Desc:
How many elements high should the menu be?
Empty or "0" means automatic height.
Settings.MenuLength.Title: Menu Length
Settings.NotificationPosition.ToastTestB:
This is the position you have chosen.
Before you test the next position, wait until this message disappears.
Settings.NotificationsPosition.Desc: Where do you want the notifications to appear on your screen?
Settings.NotificationsPosition.Title: Notify position
Settings.NotificationsStack.Desc: How many info messages do you want to see at once? The default is a maximum of 4.
Settings.NotificationsStack.Title: Notify stacks
Settings.ResetBoxPositions.Desc: Should all box coordinates be reset? This can bring back windows you managed to move out of sight.
Settings.ResetBoxPositions.Title: Box Coordinates
Settings.SelectedMenu.Desc: Choose your preferred menu from the drop-down list (game will automatically reload)
Settings.SelectedMenu.Title: Change Menu
Settings.Show2kQuestMark.Desc: Shows a small badge with a counter of how many quests you can still refuse.
Settings.Show2kQuestMark.Title: 2000 Quest Mark
Settings.ShowArmyAdvice.Desc: Shows Advice (added by the player) for specific opposing armies.
Settings.ShowArmyAdvice.Title: Show Army Advice
Settings.ShowAztecHelper.Desc: Should the "Aztec Helper" box be opened when starting a Aztec Minigame?
Settings.ShowAztecHelper.Title: Aztec Helper
Settings.ShowBlueGalaxyHelper.Desc: Displays a tool that suggests buildings to collect after collecting your Blue Galaxy
Settings.ShowBlueGalaxyHelper.Title: Display Blue Galaxy Helper
Settings.ShowEventChest.Desc: Displays various Event Assitants, when a supported event window is opened.
Settings.ShowEventChest.Title: Display Event Assistants
Settings.ShowGuildTreasuryLogExport.Desc: Displays guild treasury export log tool when opening the Guild Treasury Log window
Settings.ShowGuildTreasuryLogExport.Titl: Show guild treasury log export tool
Settings.ShowInvestments.Desc: Display a GB FP investment window when entering 'Town Hall'> 'News'> 'Great Buildings' tab.
Settings.ShowInvestments.Title: Display FP Investment sums
Settings.ShowLinks.Desc:
Replaces player names and guild names with links to player or guild profile on scoredb.io.
Replaces Building-Kitnames with links to forgeofempires.fandom.com.
Settings.ShowLinks.Title: Show links
Settings.ShowMapTradeWarning.Desc: Displays a window that covers the 'Negotiate' Button in Provinces preventing accidental clicking
Settings.ShowMapTradeWarning.Title: Negotiation Blocker
Settings.ShowMarketFilter.Desc: Displays a Trade filtering tool when the Market console is opened.
Settings.ShowMarketFilter.Title: Display Market Filter Tool
Settings.ShowNotifications.Desc: The Helper uses notifications in various places. You can switch this on or off here.
Settings.ShowNotifications.Title: Notifications
Settings.ShowOwnPartOnAllGBs.Desc: Updates the 'GB calculator' for GBs of other players
Settings.ShowOwnPartOnAllGBs.Title: Updates the 'GB calculator' for all GBs
Settings.ShowPlayersMotivation.Desc:
Should the motivation activities be tracked when the events are called?

Reload game after conversion
Settings.ShowPlayersMotivation.Title: Motivation Activity
Settings.ShowPotions.Desc: Shows an icon in the top right corner displaying the shortest currently running potion and giving an inventory list of potions upon hover. (De)Activating this option might not immediately remove/show the icon - wait or reload.
Settings.ShowPotions.Title: Battle Potions
Settings.ShowRougeUnitWarning.Desc: Display a window over the "Attack" or "Auto Battle" buttons to prevent accidental clicking when only rogues remain after the first wave.
Settings.ShowRougeUnitWarning.Title: Rogue Only Warning
Settings.ShowScoutingTimes.Desc: Displays a window when opening the map, stating the scouting times of the currently available provinces and the current scouting progress
Settings.ShowScoutingTimes.Title: Scouting Info
Settings.ShowGBGBuildings.Title: Show GBG Building Recommendation
Settings.ShowGBGBuildings.Desc: When opening the building menu in a GBG Province, a table is displayed, showing the possible building combinations that would be better than the current one, sorted by their relative impact on the Guild Treasury.
Settings.ShowPvPArena.Title: PvP-Arena-Protocol
Settings.ShowPvPArena.Desc: Show PvP-Arena-Protocol, when opening the PvP-Arena?
Settings.Version.Desc: The data below can be marked to copy them.
Settings.Version.Title: Version
Settings.doubleFPtimeout.Desc: Shows a box that temporarily covers the FP entry field in GB after a donation. The value determines the duration the box is shown in seconds - when 0, the box does not show
Settings.doubleFPtimeout.Title: Double donation blocker
Settings.RivalSound.Desc: Shall a sound be played when completing a rival quest?
Settings.RivalSound.Title: Sound for Rival-Quest
StrategyPoints.BuyableFP: FoE-Helper: Number of FPs that can be bought with coins.
StrategyPoints.FPInBar: FoE-Helper: Number of FPs in your bar.
